group_1.textLeft: Heya, Akira-chi! @How do I look?
Look at me! @Look at me!

group_1.textRight: Yeah, you look great. @It’s really cute.

group_1.textLeft: How old do I seem?

group_1.textRight: Akira (Eh......[wait:1.0] your age...? I know it normally, but...)
Akira ......[wait:1.0][chara:300850:lipSynch_1]@uh, maybe 17 years old...

group_1.textLeft: Youuu’re outta luck! @The correct answer was 13 years old!
[chara:300651:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Geez Akira-chi, getting a girl’s age wrong, that's rude you know!

group_1.textRight: You say that but you look pretty happy about it.

group_1.textLeft: I was exposed!

group_1.textRight: So then you really wanted to be seen as an adult.

group_1.textLeft: Well yeah! @At least I look the part!
I guess the rest is how you talk.

group_1.textRight: How you talk?

group_1.textLeft: Yeah, I need to talk like an adult to suit this look.
As is, everything’s all mismatched yeah?
So then I will act as an older sister character from @now on.
If I mess up, please give me advice Akira-chi.

group_1.textRight: That request is like an intro to a comedy skit but @okay.
Well then, how about you try keep up a composed demeanor?
Referring to yourself as "I" (watashi) instead of "I" @( a ? shi) would help…

group_1.textLeft: As expected of Akira-chi! If it's just that, @even "I" ( a ? shi) can...

group_1.textRight: Ah

group_1.textLeft: I (wa)…I (wa)…I (wa ? shi) think it’s possible!

group_1.textRight: I (wa ? shi)!! It’s even worse when you mix them together!

group_1.textLeft: Ugggh, my mouth is too used to it. This is harder @than I expected...

group_1.textRight: Rather than being careful with words, try being conscious of how you act!

group_1.textLeft: Acting... Acting...@[chara:300651:lipSynch_0].......[wait:1.0][chara:300651:eyeClose_0][chara:300651:motion_200][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]Alright! This time!

group_1.textRight: Yoohoo! Emily! Akira-chi! Merry Christmas!

group_1.textLeft: Ah! Shopping District Big Sis’!
...I mean...
Welcome, big sister. What kind of consultation @are you looking for today?

group_1.textRight: Oh, that was good.
It's not for a consultation today.
Since it's Christmas, I just wanted to stop by.
Here you go, orange juice as a Christmas gift!

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300651:effect_emotion_joy_0][se:7222_happy]Yaay!

group_1.textRight: E-Emily![wait:1.0][chara:300651:eyeClose_1][chara:300651:motion_000][chara:300651:cheek_0][chara:300651:face_mtn_ex_010.exp.json][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]@You’re acting like a 3 year old!

group_1.textLeft: Ah! Ahhhhh............ Huh, huuh, thank you kindly, big sister.
Well then with this juice, let's treat ourselves this evening...
Akira, can you get three glasses for us and big sister?

group_1.textRight: Here you go.

group_1.textLeft: On this holy night... cheers...
Gulp gulp gulp gulp!

group_1.textRight: Ah, you gulped it down, it was good up until then.

group_1.textLeft: [chara:300651:effect_emotion_surprise_0][se:7226_shock]Huh!? @Adults don't drink it all at once!?

group_1.textRight: Ah, Akira... @What’s up with Emily today?

group_1.textLeft: She’s trying to match her older look by behaving and speaking like an adult...

group_1.textRight: Ahh, today's Emily definitely looks mature.

group_1.textLeft: Fu fu, how old do I seem?

group_1.textRight: (She's doing it again)
(Eh......[wait:1.0]her age...? @I know it normally, but...)
.......[wait:1.0][chara:800600:lipSynch_1]uh, @maybe 17 years old...

group_1.textLeft: ........[wait:1.0][chara:300651:eyeClose_0][chara:300651:motion_000][chara:300651:lipSynch_1]Correct.

group_1.textRight: It's not correct.
I pretty much understand what's happening.
But if you’re trying to be like a 17 year old, don’t you think you’re acting too mature?

group_1.textLeft: What?

group_1.textRight: Well, for someone around Emily's age, @17 year olds do seem like adults
But, from someone whose actually experienced @being 17 years old.
17 is still very much a child pretending to be mature.
Their true nature doesn't change much from when @they were 10.
So I think acting more natural will still leave the right impression with how you look.

group_1.textLeft: As expected of an older sister... your skills are next level.
...That's right big sis'.
Tell us more of your stories about being an adult!

group_1.textRight: My stories?

group_1.textCenter: I also want to hear... about adult romance... @I'm a little curious...

group_1.textLeft: Was today a Christmas date as expected?

group_1.textRight: Today... I didn't do anything... @I got dumped yesterday...
Since I didn’t have any plans, @I came here...

group_1.textLeft: Aki-ra-chi, did I step on a land mine?

group_1.textRight: Maybe…

group_1.textLeft: What’s should an adult do in this situation?

group_1.textRight: Hmm...

group_1.textLeft: ...Please don't mind what some dumb kids say!

group_1.textRight: That’s such an irresponsible adult!
